title: Create Teacher Account
q: how do i create a teacher account
a: Go to the Edify homepage and click **Sign Up as Teacher**. Fill in your name, email, and school code if provided.

title: Log In
q: how do i log in
a: Go to **app.edify.com/login**, enter your email and password. If you forgot your password, click **Forgot Password**.

title: Reset Password
q: how do i reset my password
a: On the login screen, click **Forgot Password**, check your email, and follow the reset link.

title: Add Class
q: how do i add a class
a: From the dashboard, click **Classes → Add Class**, enter the name/grade, and save.

title: Add Student
q: how do i add a student
a: Inside your class, click **Add Student**, then enter their name and email or import from CSV.

title: Take Attendance
q: how do i take attendance
a: Open your class, click **Attendance**, then mark students present, absent, or late. Save to finalize.

title: Assign Homework
q: how do i assign homework
a: From your class page, click **Assignments → New**, enter details, attach files if needed, and assign to students.

title: Grade Assignments
q: how do i grade assignments
a: Go to **Assignments**, select the one you want, and enter scores/feedback per student.

title: Student Observations
q: how do i leave a student observation
a: Open a student profile, click **Observations → New**, choose type (academic, social, behavior), and write your note.

title: View Reports
q: how do i view reports
a: Go to **Reports → Students** to see academic, social, and behavioral progress. Export to PDF or CSV if needed.

title: Student Log In
q: how does a student log in
a: Students go to **app.edify.com/login**, enter their class code or email, then their password.

title: Reset Student Password
q: how do i reset a student password
a: Teachers can open the student profile and click **Reset Password**. The student will get a reset email.

title: Student Grades
q: how can students check their grades
a: Students log in, go to **My Grades**, and view scores per subject/class.

title: Submit Homework
q: how do students submit homework
a: On their dashboard, students click the assignment, upload files or type responses, then click **Submit**.

title: Add School
q: how do i add a school
a: Admins go to **Admin → Schools → Add School**, enter details, then save.

title: Manage Teacher Permissions
q: how do i manage teacher permissions
a: Admins can go to **Admin → Teachers**, select a teacher, and adjust their role (Teacher, Lead, or Admin).

title: School Reports
q: how do i view school analytics
a: Go to **Admin → Reports** to view school-wide progress, attendance, and performance trends.

title: Plans
q: what plans are available
a: We offer **Starter (free)**, **Pro ($12/mo per teacher)**, and **Teams (custom pricing)**.

title: Update Billing
q: how do i update billing info
a: Go to **Settings → Billing**, update your credit card or payment method, then save changes.

title: Cancel Plan
q: how do i cancel my subscription
a: Go to **Billing → Plan**, click **Cancel**, and confirm. Your account will remain active until the cycle ends.

title: Refund Policy
q: what is the refund policy
a: We offer a **14-day refund window** for first-time subscriptions.

title: Supported Devices
q: what devices are supported
a: Edify works on modern browsers (Chrome, Edge, Safari, Firefox) and iOS/Android via our mobile apps.

title: Mobile App
q: is there a mobile app
a: Yes — search for **Edify** in the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android).

title: API Access
q: does edify have an api
a: Yes. Developers can create API keys under **Settings → Developer**. Docs available at **dev.edify.com**.

title: Integrations
q: what integrations are available
a: We support **Slack, Zapier, and Google Classroom**. More integrations coming soon.

title: Support Contact
q: how do i contact support
a: Email us at **support@edify.com** or use the in-app **Help → Contact Support** option.

title: Feature Request
q: how do i suggest a feature
a: Go to **Help → Feature Requests**, or email ideas to **ideas@edify.com**.
